column2: Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col. 2)
column3: Cases Sent for Trial During the Year (Col. 3)
column4: No. of Cases Withdrawn by the Govt. (Col. 4)
column5: No. of Cases Disposed by Plea Bargaining (Col. 5)
column6: Total no. of Cases for Trial During the Year (Col. 6) = (Col.2+3 - Col.4 - Col.5)
column8: Cases in Which Trials were Completed (Col. 8) = (Col. 9+10)
column11: Cases Pending Trial at the End of the Year (Col. 11) = (Col.6 - (Col.7+8))
